name: ChopOnion
bt_task: The robot task is to chop an onion into diced onion. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. The chopping board is on the countertop in the kitchen. On the chopping board, there are a knife and an onion placed on it. The robot is initially located in the kitchen. The robot needs to put the onion on the chopping board, uses gripper to fix the onion position, then use the knife to chop the onion into diced onion, then place the knife inside sink in the kitchen. The goal is to get diced onion, and the knife is placed inside the sink. The robot has two grippers, which one gripper can hold one object at a time.

Move_to_chopping_board.description: The robot moves to the location of the chopping board.

Press_onion.description: The robot extends its one gripper to touch the onion, and presses the onion to prevent it from moving.

Grasp_knife.description: The robot grasps and lifts the knife with its one gripper.

Chop_onion.description: The robot uses the knife that is held by its gripper to chop the onion which is pressed on the chopping board by robot into diced pieces. Then the robot retrieves the gripper which presses and holds the onion. And robot still holds the knife.

Release_knife_into_sink.description: The robot extends its gripper and releases the held knife into the sink.

Move_to_sink.description: The robot moves to the location of the sink.

condition_node.Is_near_chopping_board?: Check if the robot is near at the chopping board. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Onion_pressed?: Check if the robot presses the onion with its one gripper.
condition_node.Knife_in_gripper?: Check if the knife is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.Onion_has_been_chopped?: Check if the onion is chopped into diced pieces on the chopping board.
condition_node.Is_near_sink?: Check if the robot is near the sink. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.Chopping_board_in_sink?: Check if the chopping board is in the sink.
condition_node.Knife_in_sink?: Check if the knife is in the sink.
